description: Windows host dashboard for telegraf metrics pumped into influxdb

targets.query: SELECT mean("Percent_Free_Space") *-1+100 FROM "win_disk" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "instance" =~ /^[C-Z]:$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "instance" fill(linear)
SELECT mean("Percent_Free_Space") *-1+100 FROM "win_disk" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "instance" =~ /^[C-Z]:$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "instance" fill(linear)
SELECT mean("Percent_Free_Space") *-1+100 FROM "win_disk" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "instance" =~ /^[C-Z]:$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "instance" fill(linear)
SELECT "System_Up_Time" FROM "win_system" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND  $timeFilter
SELECT last("Threads") FROM "win_system" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(null)
SELECT last("size") FROM "PGdbsizes" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "dbname" fill(none)

SELECT last("Percent_Privileged_Time") AS "% Priviledged Time", last("Percent_User_Time") AS "% User Time", last("Percent_Interrupt_Time") AS "% Interrupt Time", last("Percent_Idle_Time") AS "% Idle Time", last("Percent_Processor_Time") AS "% Processor Time" FROM "win_cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)

SELECT last("Percent_Privileged_Time") AS "% Priviledged Time", last("Percent_User_Time") AS "% User Time", last("Percent_Interrupt_Time") AS "% Interrupt Time", last("Percent_Idle_Time") AS "% Idle Time", last("Percent_Processor_Time") AS "% Processor Time" FROM "win_cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)

SELECT last("Percent_Privileged_Time") AS "% Priviledged Time", last("Percent_User_Time") AS "% User Time", last("Percent_Interrupt_Time") AS "% Interrupt Time", last("Percent_Idle_Time") AS "% Idle Time", last("Percent_Processor_Time") AS "% Processor Time" FROM "win_cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)

SELECT last("Available_Bytes") as "Available Bytes", last("Cache_Bytes") as "Cache Bytes", last("Free_&_Zero_Page_List_Bytes") as "Free_&_Zero_Page_List_Bytes" FROM "win_mem" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), host fill(linear) ORDER BY asc

SELECT last("Available_Bytes") as "Available Bytes", last("Cache_Bytes") as "Cache Bytes", last("Free_&_Zero_Page_List_Bytes") as "Free_&_Zero_Page_List_Bytes" FROM "win_mem" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), host fill(linear) ORDER BY asc
SELECT last("Percent_Free_Space") AS "% Free Space" FROM "win_disk" WHERE "instance" =~ /^$disk/ AND "host" =~ /ptlab-mpx-core/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)
SELECT last("Percent_Usage") AS "Swap percent usage" FROM "win_swap" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), host fill(linear) ORDER BY asc

SELECT last("Disk_Read_Bytes_persec") AS "Disk_Read_Bytes_persec", last("Disk_Write_Bytes_persec") AS "Disk_Write_Bytes_persec" FROM "win_disk" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "instance" =~ /^$disk$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host", instance fill(0)

SELECT last("Avg._Disk_Read_Queue_Length") AS "Avg._Disk_Read_Queue_Length", last("Avg._Disk_Write_Queue_Length") AS "Avg._Disk_Write_Queue_Length" FROM "win_disk" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "instance" =~ /^$disk$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host", instance fill(0)

SELECT last("Disk_Reads_persec") AS "Disk_Reads_persec", last("Disk_Writes_persec") AS "Disk_Writes_persec" FROM "win_disk" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "instance" =~ /^$disk$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host", instance fill(0)
SELECT mean("Working_Set_-_Private") FROM "win_proc" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "instance" =~ /^$mpx_process$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "instance" fill(none)

SELECT last("Percent_Processor_Time") as "% Processor Time" FROM "win_proc" WHERE "("host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "instance" =~ /^$mpx_process$/)  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), instance fill(linear)

SELECT last("Percent_Processor_Time") as "% Processor Time" FROM "win_proc" WHERE "("host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "instance" =~ /^$mpx_process$/)  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), instance fill(linear)
SELECT last("IO_Write_Bytes_persec") AS "Write" FROM "win_proc" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND instance =~ /$other_process$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), instance fill(0)
SELECT last("IO_Write_Bytes_persec") AS "Write" FROM "win_proc" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND instance =~ /$other_process$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), instance fill(0)
SELECT mean("Working_Set_-_Private") FROM "win_proc" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "instance" =~ /^$mpx_process$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "instance" fill(none)
SELECT mean("Working_Set_-_Private") FROM "win_proc" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "instance" =~ /^$mpx_process$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "instance" fill(none)
SELECT mean("Working_Set_-_Private") FROM "win_proc" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "instance" =~ /^$mpx_process$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "instance" fill(none)

SELECT last("Percent_Processor_Time") as "% Processor Time" FROM "win_proc" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND instance =~ /$other_process$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), instance fill(linear)

SELECT last("Percent_Processor_Time") as "% Processor Time" FROM "win_proc" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND instance =~ /$other_process$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), instance fill(linear)

SELECT last("Percent_Processor_Time") as "% Processor Time" FROM "win_proc" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND instance =~ /$other_process$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), instance fill(linear)
SELECT last("Working_Set_-_Private") FROM "win_proc" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND instance =~ /$other_process$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), instance fill(none)
SELECT last("IO_Write_Bytes_persec") AS "Write" FROM "win_proc" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND instance =~ /$other_process$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), instance fill(0)
SELECT last("IO_Write_Bytes_persec") AS "Write" FROM "win_proc" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND instance =~ /$other_process$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), instance fill(0)
SELECT last("IO_Read_Operations_persec") AS "Write" FROM "win_proc" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND instance =~ /$other_process$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), instance fill(0)
SELECT last("IO_Read_Operations_persec") AS "Write" FROM "win_proc" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND instance =~ /$other_process$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), instance fill(0)
SELECT last("Handle_Count") as "Handle Count" FROM "win_proc" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND instance =~ /$other_process$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), instance fill(0)

SELECT mean("Bytes_Received_persec") *8 AS "Bytes Received persec", mean("Bytes_Sent_persec") AS "Bytes Sent persec" FROM "win_net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "instance" =~ /$network$/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host", instance fill(linear)

SELECT mean("Packets_Received_persec") AS "Packets Received / sec", mean("Packets_Sent_persec") AS "Packets Sent / sec" FROM "win_net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "instance" =~ /$network$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host", instance fill(linear)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = "host" WHERE core = 'on'

list.name: host
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = "host" WHERE core = 'on'

list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "win_proc" WITH KEY = "instance"

list.description: number of logical CPU in windows server. Use in calculating CPU usage for each process (widgets "CPU usage")
list.label: win_cpu
list.name: win_cpu_num

title: CORE server
